alert.note: Alert for Chesapeake; Southampton; Suffolk (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 12:24AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Scattered thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Hertford, northwestern Gates, and southeastern Southampton Counties, the west central City of Chesapeake and the City of Suffolk through 115 AM EDT... At 1223 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking scattered thunderstorms centered in an area from Suffolk to Como. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Rain 1 to 2 inches. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Possible minor localized flooding of low lying and poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Franklin, Downtown Suffolk, Holland, Chesapeake, Suffolk, Gates, Como, Whaleyville, Kings Fork, Chowan Beach, Topsy, Suffolk Airport, Dort, Wilroy, Sunbeam, Bartonsville, Riverdale, Nurney, Kilby and Elwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
